sub_title: Associate General Counsel for EMEA and Latin America at Hays
summary:
After more than ten years' experience as a corporate, banking and finance lawyer, and with an LL.M. in International Business Law from Sorbonne University in partnership with INSEAD, I am currently Associate General Counsel for EMEA and Latin America with HAYS Recruiting Experts Worldwide.
My role focuses mainly on Managed Service Programmes and Recruitment Process Outsourcing, namely for a leading European aircraft manufacturer, a global leading technology communications company and an international semiconductor manufacturer, as well as single- and multiple-jurisdiction commercial end-to-end agreements.
Our core expertise is on legal and strategical matters surrounding privacy and data protection, including the General Data Protection Regulation and E-Privacy Regulation.

Having lived in Ireland, South Africa, Russia and Portugal and travelled intensely around the world, I studied in the English, French and Portuguese school systems, being fluent in all three languages, as well as Spanish. 

Specialties: Data Protection, Contract, Alternative Investments, Structured Products, Pharmaceutical, Corporate, Insurance, Banking and Finance, Mergers and Acquisitions.

profile_positions.description:
- Drafting, reviewing and negotiating multiple-jurisdiction outsourcing services’ agreements, including Managed Service Programmes and Recruitment Process Outsourcing, namely for a leading European aircraft manufacturer, a global leading technology communications company and an international semiconductor manufacturer.
- Drafting, reviewing and negotiating single- and multiple-jurisdiction commercial end-to-end agreements (namely for permanent recruitment, temporary placements, freelance contractors, secondments, etc.), relevant local enabling agreements, confidentiality agreements, Software as a Service agreements, payrolling agreements, service level agreements, intercompany agreements and supplier agreements.
- Advising business on legal and strategical matters surrounding privacy and data protection, including the General Data Protection Regulation and E-Privacy Regulation, as well as monitoring all relevant services, processes, solutions and systems to assure compliance with privacy and data protection laws.
- Reviewing and negotiating client terms to ensure they adequately protect the company’s interests, requirements and policies, whilst collaborating with the finance, sales, operations, IT security and other business units, at all levels throughout the organisation.
- Creating and delivering training, particularly on general compliance, company policies, general legal issues, risk tolerance, and data privacy; drafting contract templates, guidance notes and playbooks.
- Housekeeping and corporate statutory support to Hays in EMEA and LatAm.
- Coordinating external law firms and legal advisors, namely for the management and reporting of disputes and litigation.
- Member of the Diversity and Inclusion Committee.

profile_positions.description:
- Corporate house keepings of French parent-companies and international subsidiaries: shareholders’ agreements, company bylaws, general meetings, etc.
- Drafting, review and negotiation of single- and multiple-jurisdiction commercial agreements, confidentiality agreements, intercompany agreements and supplier agreements.
- Working closely with management, commercial and operational teams in further developing the services in different jurisdictions.
- Coordinating external law firms and legal advisors.
profile_positions.title: Legal Advisor

profile_positions.description:
As a legal advisor at Bird & Bird’s corporate department, my experience spanned over diverse sectors, in both French and international projects, throughout the different stages of a company’s life, particularly their external growth through cross-border transactions.

Drafting corporate house-keeping legal documentation including shareholders’ and board meetings’ minutes and convening notices, management reports, appointment of corporate bodies, share capital increase, company bylaws, etc.

Drafting share purchase/sale and shareholder agreements for a joint-venture.

Legal due diligence, drafting of DD report, drafting and negotiation of letter of intent and SPA (French and English), namely in the context of cross-border transactions in Sub-Saharan Africa, subject to OHADA law.

Legal Advisor for Alternative Investments and Structured Products at the Portuguese investment bank BPI. 

My previous experience as a Legal Advisor for the Portuguese investment bank BPI not only strengthened my commercial awareness, technical and quantitative skills but also my complex financial data know-how, allowing me to think cross-product and across the spectrum, giving valuable input and offer a fresh approach to projects.

Drafting and review of counterparty agreements, prospectus, bylaws and management reports for the fund of hedge funds “Vasco da Gama”.

Structuring, execution and drafting documentation of transactions involving the sale and distribution of structured products (credit, FX, commodity, rates), including agreements with institutional counterparties such as ISDA Master Agreements, Credit Support Annexes and derivatives’ confirmations.
profile_positions.title: Legal Advisor

profile_positions.description:
As an associate lawyer at Vieira de Almeida, a major Portuguese law firm, I practiced pharmaceutical, corporate and insurance law but mainly with the Banking and Finance teams. Being involved in projects with a great degree of responsibility allowed me to develop a strong sense of accountability and thoroughness, whilst constantly improving my relationship with the clients and counterparties. My dependability, maturity and sense of humour, even under high pressure situations with difficult deadlines, have been praised by both colleagues and clients.

Structuring several financing transactions, LBO, issue and placement of debt hybrid and equity instruments and of warrants, namely under EMTN programmes.

Advising the IPO of a Portuguese company on NYSE Euronext Lisboa: drafting the documentation regarding the transformation into a limited-liability company, drafting of the transaction schedule and prospectus, etc.

Legal due diligence, drafting of DD report, drafting and negotiation of NDA, letter of intent and SPA, namely in the context of the acquisition of a major clinker producer in Sub-Saharan Africa.

Assessing the sell-side in the largest M&A operation in the Portuguese pharmaceutical industry to date

Preparation of project finance mortgage and SME securitization transactions for key market players, such as the largest motorway operator and transport infrastructure company in Portugal, taking €400 million of future toll road revenues and repackaging it into asset-backed floating rate notes.
